subtitles.text: In Nogisaka, where there are many members who spill things or drop things

The Valentine's Day project, which has created many legends in the past, is back for this year's Okebitobo season!
This time, the youngest members will confess their feelings to their favorite senior members by giving them a caretaker's book as a token of their gratitude for their support this year.
However, the senior members who think they will be chosen will be asked to run for the position and confess their feelings for their favorite member.
They will be told that they will take care of you.
The best thing to do is to have a good relationship with your junior members.
The worst thing that can happen is that no one will be chosen.
If that happens, we'll have a drink to punish them.
No, but let's have both.No, but let's do both.

I don't know what it is, but I'm sure they're serious about it.

I'm sure someone's going to cry today.
